name: Southern Cross Gold Consolidated Ltd.
longDescription: Southern Cross Gold Consolidated operates three exploration projects, two in Victoria and one in Queensland, Australia. Our flagship project, the 100%-owned Sunday Creek epizonal-style gold project, is located 60 km north of Melbourne within 19,365 ha of granted exploration tenements. SXGC is also the freehold landholder of 1,054.5 ha that form the key portion in and around the main drill area and the land immediately adjacent to the south.

fullAddress: 1090 West Georgia Street,Suite 1305, Vancouver, BC, CA
